description:
Lauren Graham and Matthew Perry are back together ... kind of.在某种程度上来说，Lauren Graham和Mattew Perry又要重聚了。

The "Parenthood" star is set to guest alongside Perry on "The Odd Couple" reboot at CBS. 正在《为人父母》中出演的女星Lauren Graham将会加入Perry的CBS新剧《单身公寓》。

The upcoming comedy -- which stars Perry and Thomas Lennon ("Sean Saves the World," "Reno" 911) as college friends who move in together after both of their marriages fail -- will feature Graham as Gaby, the ex-wife of Perry's Oscar Madison.这部即将在CBS开播的喜剧讲述的是Perry和Thomas Lennon扮演的一对大学好友在双双婚姻失败后一起搬进了一套公寓——二Graham则会扮演Perry的角色Oscar Madison的前妻Gaby。

Of course, this isn't the first time that the real-life exes -- yes, they totally were an item -- have appeared on one of Perry's shows together. Graham previously guest starred on "Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip" and "Go On."这不是这对现实生活中曾经在一起的情侣第一次剧中扮演一对了。Graham还曾经客串过《Studio 60 on Sunset Strip》和《阳光先生》。

Yvette Nicole Brown ("Community") is also a regular on "The Odd Couple," which is expected to premiere on CBS in 2015.Yvette Nicole Brown也将会在《单身公寓》中扮演循环角色，这部新剧预计将会在2015年在CBS电视台播出。

title: 《老友记》Mathew Perry新剧《单身公寓》
